name: core
description: Monorepo for Verii core. Includes common modules, registrar endpoints, credential agent, mock vendor builds
author: Andres Olave

scripts.contracts:build:hardhat: yarn workspace @verii/permissions-contract run build:hardhat && yarn workspace @verii/verification-coupon-contract run build:hardhat && yarn workspace @verii/metadata-registry-contract run build:hardhat && yarn workspace @verii/revocation-list-contract run build:hardhat
scripts.contracts:clean:hardhat: yarn workspace @verii/permissions-contract run clean:hardhat && yarn workspace @verii/verification-coupon-contract run clean:hardhat && yarn workspace @verii/metadata-registry-contract run clean:hardhat && yarn workspace @verii/revocation-list-contract run clean:hardhat
scripts.contracts:deploy:hardhat: yarn contracts:assert-target-env && yarn workspace @verii/permissions-contract run hardhat:deploy && yarn workspace @verii/verification-coupon-contract run hardhat:deploy && yarn workspace @verii/metadata-registry-contract run hardhat:deploy && yarn workspace @verii/revocation-list-contract run hardhat:deploy
scripts.contracts:upgrade:hardhat: yarn contracts:assert-target-env && yarn workspace @verii/permissions-contract run hardhat:upgrade && yarn workspace @verii/verification-coupon-contract run hardhat:upgrade && yarn workspace @verii/metadata-registry-contract run hardhat:upgrade && yarn workspace @verii/revocation-list-contract run hardhat:upgrade
scripts.contracts:test:post-upgrade: yarn contracts:assert-target-env && yarn workspace @verii/permissions-contract run test:post-upgrade && yarn workspace @verii/verification-coupon-contract run test:post-upgrade && yarn workspace @verii/metadata-registry-contract run test:post-upgrade && yarn workspace @verii/revocation-list-contract run test:post-upgrade
scripts.check-packages: yarn clean && yarn compile && yarn test && yarn lint
scripts.check-licenses: yarn licenses list --production --json | grep table | node ./check-license.js
